title: Dear Riot: Please remove winning. It is an incredibly unhealthy mechanic.
body:
So I was looking at some statistics and I saw something incredibly unnerving:

**In 100% games where one team wins, the other team loses.**

This is entirely unacceptable. Rito please fix this, I should not lose just because I lost. Unbalanced mechanics like this are why I'm Bronze 6.

replies.body: If winning is unhealthy, I'm in good shape.
Some people just get all the lemons in life. Others get coconuts. (Coconut milk is gross and has jack shit on soy milk, Soy milk is OP)
Soy is absolutely terrible for you.
Im allergic to real milk.
Real milk. As in cows milk. Is also not that great. It has nutrient blocking chemicals and is rather fatty.
If you want to pick it apart I'm allergic to all dairy, eggs, and most nuts(excluding like pistachios and almonds. tree nuts.)

I am allergic to nuts. But I choose not to eat dairy. It isn't very healthy(except eggs)

Diet is largely Salmon, Veggies like cauliflower/broccoli/mushrooms, I like fruit in general, dark chocolate all natural no soy or milk, tart cherries, cranberries, master brew kombucha with ginger, ginger root, onions, Garlic, herbal teas. Treats are things like watermelon, shrimp and bread with olive oil, garlic and spices. C= 

Not criticising your diet tho. I just personally avoid Soy.
egg is a dairy?!
It isn't, but a lot of markets put them in the dairy section.  I'm assuming it's because they need to be kept cold.
Nope, it's because they come from cows.
Whenever I go to the market they don't refrigerate them
Maybe it's an American thing.  I'd assume we do it because we don't often have farms close enough to our homes to get eggs super fresh, making it important to preserve them with the cold.

But are you allergic too...
_**DEEZ NUTS?**_
I'll see myself out with my ~~very original~~ joke.

That sounds good. Salmon is my favorite meat.
I mostly eat rice though. Rice with beef or an egg and various fruit. (Apples and various fruit juices.)
i've logged in after 8 months to upvote this. i like your food choices
Cool.
I eat anything on my plate as long as it's edible.
Come to Oregon, you would love it here.
I would. Sadly do to family I am stuck in ~~hell~~ Florida.
Lots of fun critters and nice weather eh?
The bears and gators and hurricanes I can deal with. It is the people. Haha.
Come back to your kin in Oregon... We have plenty of people with similar interests.
Soon. Perhaps after I fix car :>
In other news, milk is actually good for you.

That's partially incorrect. One or two glasses of normal milk per day isn't too bad, but the real reason everyone thinks that milk is so good for you is that it's subsidized a lot by the government. Milk contains a decent amount of fat and sugar, actually, which, of course, is needed for your body, but too much of anything isn't good for you. In other words, my opinion is that if you don't need to drink 5 glasses of milk per day or whatever the FDA says.

~From a person that doesn't have any medical degree and is very possibly incorrect.

Maybe I'm just ignorant to it, but I've never seen anyone recommend 5 glasses of milk per day lol. Yes, too much milk is bad....but so is everything that I could even think of lol. So I don't like that argument. The person I replied to said milk isn't good for you because it's fatty lol. So I was just telling him that he is incorrect, assuming we're not talking about drinking 3 gallons per day, which is a pretty fair assumption I think.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
What do you look confused about lol?
Sarcastic mind blown. Who had any idea that milk is good for you?
Oh, you must have missed the comment I replied to. He said milk is bad for you lol.

Its been proven actually to reduce your sperm count and over time actually pump phermones into you. If you drink a lot of it for a long period of time you are literally changing your gender, its a newer story so more might come about tit but this is what ive read so far
Im more womanly than most of my classmates.... But I'm still a male.

yup yup. soy milk is high in estrogen. it's not THAT new of a story. they made jokes about it in GTA V which is... 5 years oldish? you are what you eat is an old saying that is relatively accurate. eat a lot of sugar and your body will bloat, your bloodstream will be saturated, and scabs will start looking bubbly. consume hormones and your body will physically change. consume fats and oils and you'll become more oily. everything in the body is made up of like... the same 22 or something proteins, basic elements, and so on.  so consuming too many of those parts will alter the body to make use of the excess we dont crap out or in the case of over consumption... cant get rid of. it's one way humans adapt to their surroundings. elements make us sick when consuming too much as they're not meant to be in our body - which is why medicine involves taking capsulized elements. they cause the body to do something it doesnt want to do. organic material allows the body to make decisions on its own although those decisions can sometimes be wrong due to faulty tissue and dna.

------ this is just a hypothesis, but somewhere im sure there's a theory and tests that someone has done to represent my hypothesis with data and findings.
estrogen keeps you young
i could see that. since women tend to age less until they hit menopause.
Milk does this too. Contains female cow hormones, so sounds like a lose lose scenario.
I'm afraid I don't know what you are trying to ridicule.

> [{quoted}](name=HackRawESOMe,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ojsiIo6b,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-12T23:22:26.032+0000)
>
> I'm afraid I don't know what you are trying to ridicule.

I think he's mocking every aspect of the bronze mentality all at once. lol

im bronze. personally the only opinions that i have are that i miss team builder and while i like the visual voice and artwork updates the kit destruction/revamping and shop updating/item removal is kind of annoying. im a fan of more traditional game design where changes come in the form of a sequel instead of updating. other than that it seems like Esports prevents sportsmanship. either that or players just cant figure out the difference between bullying your opponent and friendly competition.

with all that being said i skipped out on last season since it didnt fit my mood/playstyle. i'm thinking about checking out the current season though. the assassin update rubbed me the wrong way. im hoping all of the balance issues are worked out.
Lucky I'm only PaperBag 13
wow, I'm hard stuck in Toilet 420
And I'm stuck in bed.
* Implying you didn't already lose when you hit "Play"

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6DGNZnfKYnU
_A strange game. The only winning move is not to play._

Wrong. Loss forgiven means teams can win without the other team losing. 

Stay bronze, scrub.

Did you know?

100% players who achieve Victory actually Win the game.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ojsiIo6b,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2017-01-13T02:44:48.177+0000)
>
> Did you know?
> 
> 100% players who achieve Victory actually Win the game.

Did you also know that 100% of players who forfeit actually lose the game?
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/GD6qtc2_AQA/hqdefault.jpg

That's actually not true.
I've had a game where we Surrendered, then the enemy team surrendered before the nexus did boom, so we won.
I can't tell if you're joking or not.  If true, how did both teams decide to surrender at once?

Well, someone on both teams called /ff, and got 4 (or 5) Votes.
So we had the ''your team surrendered'' and ''The enemy team agreed to surrender'' in chat, some confusing camera movement followed by ''Victory'' with the Camera on our Nexus IIRC
